text: 1.44 Wkp 14.1-32, Mak 3.12, 7.36, Luk 5.14 Yɨp dɨnɨgek suŋ lup agɨl, bɨ olap ma agɨnɨmɨn agak. Bɨ Mosis bɨlel God takaw ak ñu kɨl tɨkak tek, nad anɨgɨnɨmɨn agak. Nad amɨl, bɨ God nop sɨbogep ak nop wak nad yoman agak. Yomɨl, soy ladek yad ak suŋ lup agɨl, chag sipsip olap God nop pak ñɨnɨmɨn agak. Pak ñe, bɨ okok kɨli nɨgɨnɨgabal, soy ladek nad ak suŋ lup agak.
